query.default: select DepName, DepId, FullName, DocName, OriginalOrCopy, DeliveryDate, ScheduledReturnDate, OverdueDelay, DocId, Hyperlink from Sungero_Reports_DocumentsReturn where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId

query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [FullName] nvarchar(max) NULL, [DocName] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [OriginalOrCopy] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [DeliveryDate] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [ScheduledReturnDate] nvarchar(max) NULL, [OverdueDelay] int NULL, [DocId] int NOT NULL, [Hyperlink] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL, [DepName] nvarchar(max) NULL, [DepId] int NULL)
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId citext NOT NULL, FullName citext NULL, DocName citext NOT NULL, OriginalOrCopy citext NOT NULL, DeliveryDate citext NOT NULL, ScheduledReturnDate citext NULL, OverdueDelay int NULL, DocId int NOT NULL, Hyperlink citext NOT NULL, DepName citext NULL, DepId int NULL)
